fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Duel someone in 5D Chess w/ Multiverse Time Travel™️ on Steam
- (Dueling happens during the night, but you choose to duel them during the day.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> If your target does not own 5D Chess w/ Multiverse Time Travel™️ on Steam, you will deal a Powerful Attack to them.
> In the case you yourself do not own 5D Chess w/ Multiverse Time Travel™️ on Steam, you may ask Wolfi to act in your place since they do own the game. They may not talk about having done this, though, unless you let them.
> You will also attack them if the loser of the game. In the case of a draw, rematch.
> Regardless of whether they lose, you will roleblock them.
